message.body: Let me know if you need anything else.
I'll mail the check out yo you tomorrow morning.
By the way, did you tell them what i was asking? Because i don't want to give my dad trouble about questioning the other aunt.
I told them you called me for the address since they neglected to give you the address, and asked them if it was okay if the money came to me instead of them.
They said yes, and that was it.
If there's anything else going on, you can talk to me about it instead of them if they're giving you shit.
Oh, that was so perfect! Because we really want to help you out, but I'm not sure you'll get the money, (i don't really trust them.) And i don't want the
m to yell at my dad.
Yes,i will talk to you instead next time. And again we're so sorry about your mom and sorry that we couldn't come.
It's all right. Thank you for your thoughts.
Let me know if you need any help, we're more than happy to help you. Anytime!
